messages.name: create_release
messages.title: Create a release
messages.description: Create a release on a GitHub repository.

target_commitish.description: Specifies the commitish value that determines where the Git tag is created from. Can be any branch or commit SHA. Unused if the Git tag already exists. Default: the repository's default branch (usually master).
target_commitish.title: Target commitish

body.description: Text describing the contents of the tag
body.title: Body

draft.description: true to create a draft (unpublished) release, false to create a published one. Default: false
draft.title: Draft

prerelease.description: true to identify the release as a prerelease. false to identify the release as a full release. Default: false
prerelease.title: Prerelease

messages.name: create_status
messages.title: Create a status
messages.description: Create a status on a GitHub ref.

sha.description: The ref SHA code on which you want to set the status. It's usually a commit id.
sha.title: Sha

target_url.description: The target URL to associate with this status. This URL will be linked from the GitHub UI to allow users to easily see the 'source' of the Status.
target_url.title: Target url

description.description: A short description of the status
description.title: Description

context.description: A string label to differentiate this status from the status of other systems.
context.title: Context

messages.name: get_pull_request
messages.title: Get a single pull request
messages.description: Get a pull request from a GitHub repository.

messages.name: get_repository
messages.title: Get repository
messages.description: Get details about a GitHub repository.

messages.name: get_latest_release
messages.title: Get the latest release
messages.description: Get the latest release of a GitHub repository.

messages.name: get_user
messages.title: Get user
messages.description: Get details about a GitHub user.

messages.name: list_issues
messages.title: List issues
messages.description: List issues from a GitHub repository.

state.description: Indicates the state of the issues to return
state.title: State

milestone.description: The milestone set to the issue to return
milestone.title: Milestone

assignee.description: The user having the issue assigned to
assignee.title: Assignee

creator.description: The user that created the issue
creator.title: Creator

mentioned.description: A user that's mentioned in the issue
mentioned.title: Mentioned

labels.description: A list of comma separated label names. Example: bug,ui,@high
labels.title: Labels

since.description: Only issues updated at or after this time are returned. This is a timestamp in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ.
since.title: Since

messages.name: list_pull_requests
messages.title: List pull requests
messages.description: List pull requests from a GitHub repository.

state.description: Indicates the state of the issues to return
state.title: State

head.description: Filter pulls by head user and branch name in the format of user:ref-name. Example: github:new-script-format.
head.title: Head

base.description: Filter pulls by base branch name. Example: gh-pages.
base.title: Base

messages.name: list_repository_contributors
messages.title: List repository contributors
messages.description: List all of the contributors to a GitHub repository.

page.description: The page number of items you'd like to return.
page.title: Page

per_page.description: How many items would you like to return per page? Max is 100.
per_page.title: Per page

messages.name: list_repository_forks
messages.title: List repository forks
messages.description: List all of the forks of a GitHub repository.

page.description: The page number of items you'd like to return.
page.title: Page

per_page.description: How many items would you like to return per page? Max is 100.
per_page.title: Per page

name: github-trigger
title: GitHub
description: Receive events from a GitHub repository.

action.title: Actions to filter
action.description: Pull request actions you want to filter (leave empty to get all actions)

action.title: Actions to filter
action.description: Pull request actions you want to filter (leave empty to get all actions)

action.title: Actions to filter
action.description: Pull request actions you want to filter (leave empty to get all actions)
